resources.string: It is one of the most beautiful municipalities of Antioquia, located in the east of the department, located 4 hours from Medellin, and surrounded by beautiful spas and Tourist Sites
It is a beautiful hotel located at Km 2 via a Granada with fabulous wet areas and direct access to the river San Carlos.
Beautiful colonial hotel, located behind the church s main park, with 19 rooms,air conditioning, cable TV and WiFi.

Located two blocks from the main park, Ideal for a night of dancing with the best music and the best dance of San Carlos.
Located in the main park, Ideal for listening to the best music of the 60s, with excellent service and comfortable spaces.
Located in the main park, lives the best experience of light and sound to have a good time rumba, has air conditioning and a variety of liquors.
Three beautiful waterfalls, about 10 meters each, to reach them a deviation in the hamlet that is in the ecological trail takes the Viejita.
Is located 5 hours main park to get to it is passed by waterfalls and several ecological trails, it is considered one of the largest geological formations of Antioquia.
It is a family resort with crystal clear water, it is located in the La Viejita to two kilometers from the main park.
